A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The blending of the old with the new and the action with the drama makes this one of the best of the series so far. I found it more watchable but still a bit confusing\, too long and sometimes a bit too dark. Rey is the new heroine of the series and I found her platonic relationship with Finn and his partnership with Rose to be an interesting sort of triangle. Kylo is a star turn for Adam Driver who has always seems younger than his 34 years.
